mapper.update:
update parking_record
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prepay_id = #{prepayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parking_id = #{parkingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
entrance_id = #{entranceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
exit_id = #{exitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
service_charge = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
applet_order_sn = #{appletOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qr_code_order_sn = #{qrCodeOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alpay_order_sn = #{alPayOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
advance_id = #{advanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update parking_record set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prepay_id = #{prepayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parking_id = #{parkingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, entrance_id = #{entranceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, exit_id = #{exitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_charge = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, out_time = #{outTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applet_order_sn = #{appletOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qr_code_order_sn = #{qrCodeOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alpay_order_sn = #{alPayOrderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advance_id = #{advanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from parking_record where car_number = #{carNumber} and status != 1 order by in_time desc limit 0,1
SELECT FROM parking_record WHERE order_sn = #{orderSn} OR applet_order_sn= #{orderSn} OR qr_code_order_sn= #{orderSn} LIMIT 1
select from parking_record where status=2 and pay_status=0 and parking_id = #{parkingId} and exit_id=#{exitId} order by out_time desc limit 0,1
SELECT FROM parking_record WHERE alpay_order_sn= #{orderSn} LIMIT 1
